Vice Chair @RepMaloney has introduced H.R.674, the Gun Violence Prevention Research Act of 2019, which would dedicate an additional $50M/year to studying gun violence. Read the full bill here: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/674/text …

Conservatively, researchers estimate gun violence costs at least $229B each year, incl. medical treatment, legal fees, incarceration, long-term medical/disability expenses, police & emergency services, mental health care & security enhancements. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/get-there/wp/2018/02/22/the-enormous-economic-cost-of-gun-violence/?utm_term=.c65c312a8233 …
